entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
